title: Park Kyu-seon
text:
Park Kyu-Seon (born 24 September 1981) is a South Korean <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player.
He was part of the <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">South Korea football team</a> in <a href="2004%20Summer%20Olympics">2004 Summer Olympics</a>, who finished second in Group A, making it through to the next round, before being defeated by silver medal winners <a href="Paraguay">Paraguay</a>.
Club career statistics.
"As of end of <a href="2009%20K-League">2009</a> season"
